name: metrics_bankf
description: Metrics snapshot for the bankf tile

transaction_result.description: Result of loading and executing a transaction

transaction_result_instructon_error.description: An error occurred while processing an instruction

transaction_result_account_not_found.description: The transaction fee payer address was not found

transaction_result_program_account_not_f.description: A program account referenced by the transaction was not found

transaction_result_insufficient_funds_fo.description: The transaction fee payer did not have balance to pay the fee

transaction_result_invalid_account_for_f.description: The transaction fee payer account is not owned by the system program, or has data that is not a nonce

transaction_result_already_processed.description: The transaction has already been processed in a recent block

transaction_result_blockhash_not_found.description: The transaction references a blockhash that is not recent, or advances a nonce with the wrong value

transaction_result_invalid_program_for_e.description: A program account referenced by the transaction was no executable. TODO: No longer needed with SIMD-0162

transaction_result_address_lookup_table_.description: The transaction references an ALUT account that does not exist or is inactive

transaction_result_invalid_address_looku.description: The transaction references an ALUT account that is not owned by the ALUT program account
The transaction references an ALUT account that contains data which is not a valid ALUT
The transaction references an account offset from the ALUT which does not exist

transaction_result_max_loaded_accounts_d.description: The total account data size of the loaded accounts exceeds the consensus limit

transaction_result_duplicate_instruction.description: A compute budget program instruction was invoked more than once

transaction_result_invalid_loaded_accoun.description: The compute budget program was invoked and set the loaded accounts data size to zero

transaction_result_nonce_already_advance.description: The transaction references a nonce account that is already advanced

transaction_result_nonce_advance_failed.description: The transaction is a nonce transaction but the advance instruction was not valid or failed

transaction_result_nonce_wrong_blockhash.description: The transaction is a nonce transaction but the blockhash is not the correct one

transaction_result_account_in_use.description: The transaction conflicts with another transaction in the microblock. TODO: No longer possible with smart dispatcher

transaction_result_account_loaded_twice.description: The transaction references the same account twice

transaction_result_signature_failure.description: The transaction had an invalid signature

transaction_result_too_many_account_lock.description: The transaction references too many accounts. TODO: No longer possible with smart dispatcher

transaction_result_insufficient_funds_fo.description: The transaction would leave an account with a lower balance than the rent-exempt minimum

transaction_result_unbalanced_transactio.description: The total referenced account lamports before and after the transaction was unbalanced

transaction_result_bundle_peer.description: The transaction was part of a bundle and an earlier transaction in the bundle failed

transaction_landed.description: Whether a transaction landed in the block or not

transaction_landed_landed_fees_only.description: Transaction landed, but was fees only and did not execute

transaction_landed_landed_failed.description: Transaction landed, but failed to execute
